header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Equality Vote, Ireland, Politics, School, Birthdays, Birthday Parties, Joking, Marriage, Embarrassing Mothers
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, telling jokes

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler

body.u: so what did you think of the equality vote?
erm I thought I don't really know the results
I think it's erm going to be a yes
oh erm I hope it's going to be yes cos all all my friends and stuff say it's yes say yes
do they?
yes
didn't you say that some people in your school wanted a no?
well yeah but they they seem like the unmature ones and they haven't really they're not very smart
do you think they're a bit homophobic?
I don't know just don't think they're clever enough to to know that just cos you're gay doesn't mean you're not an actual person it just means you're gay
were they? what were they against? people being gay or people having kids if they were gay?
people people being gay they just said just cos it's wrong they have no real valid point they just it's just eh their take on it erm I hope that when they get older they have a different view on it
yeah how many boys do you think are are like that?
out of my whole year?
mm hm
thirty thirty forty
really? who are against it?
there's about fifty that are not against it
so thirty were against it that's quite a lot
mm hm
what would you have voted for?
I would have voted yes if I could have
yeah?
cos I think gays should have the same right to marry as anyone else
yeah
cos marrying can be a really good thing for someone
yeah why do you think marriage would be a good thing for the people?
erm it's kind of like it's kind of like you you share a bond with each other and you really like love each other and you give yourself to each other and all that
and why would that be different than them just being boyfriend or girlfriend or?

erm I think because boyfriend or girlfriend is kind of easier to just break up I think with marry you really are sure that you're never going to break up and you really you just love each other that much that you'd want to spend the rest of your life with them
it's something to do with commitment then?
yeah
would you get married?
yeah
really?
yeah I don't think I'd do it in like a religious place though unless they were religious
yeah where would you get married?
I don't know a beach? beach sounds like the best place if it's not going to be a church
when do you think's a good age do you think to be married?
I don't know thirty thirty something? if not then like forty
forty thirty?
yeah
and you have do you ever want to have kids?
sorry?
want to have kids?
probably cos well a lot of what I've heard from a lot of people is ki their kids are like their favourite thing in their whole life like that's pretty cool
yeah that's pretty cool isn't it?
yeah
well you're a pretty favourite part of my life you know it might even be above ice cream but I don't know it depends
maybe
yeah I would like to be married one day what kind of erm? what do you think? do you think you'd need to be have a good job and have a good house and things before you're married?

erm I think I think you'd need to have a stable life before you're married you don't nece I don't think you necessarily have to have a good job or a good house you can just have I it doesn't really matter I think as long as you are committed to your partner then that's what marriage is about and not about a good house or a good good like not about having a rich house or anything just about commitment and just loving each other
do you think they might need sa stability though?
I think stability would be a very a very big factor in it I think it'd be hard to marry if you didn't but I don't think iId let anything stopping marriage
I've ba a lot of people getting married and then they're they want kids so they want to bring up kids in a stable way don't they?
yeah
they're not kids about the same time
yeah but I don't think that should stop you from having kids cos if like
you've got to be able to afford to have them pay for them
yeah that's true
they need somewhere to live and enough food

yeah as long as you've got enough food then I think it's fine I don't think there should be any law or whatwhat or whatever to just to say you can't have kids or marry and that is the situation cos if that brings happiness to your life
yeah but do you th I think sometimes it's selfish though to just have kids when you can't afford to house them or pay for them
yeah but obviously so you can pay for them and house them
yeah
but
cos you've got to cos you can't just be asking other people even that even if that means through the government other people
yeah I know I know
it's not very fair
I know
how many k how many kids would you want?
two that would be good preferably a girl and a boy
yeah what would you? what would you teach the boy and the girl do you think?
to be go to be kind to others and stuff and you sh do what do what you want and then you know? like have a good life
would you have any rules?
yeah
what kind of rules would you have?
obviously like bedtime and stuff that you can't be going to bed at one o' clock in the morning and stuff
what other kinds of rules?
well feel like there's millions of rules but I don't think I could go through all of them
what about? what would you do if they were being mean to other people at school?
erm if they were being mean to someone else at school I don't know I think I I'd punish them in some way
how would you punish them?

I'd punish them for two days by no one day by erm one day by maybe not letting them either do their favourite sport or their favourite game but then but then after that's like expired I'd talk to them and I'd talk to them about it and make them understand why you shouldn't be mean cos otherwise it can hurt them and then like you should also treat other people like how you'd like to be treated
what if they just said rubbish and didn't ignored you
erm if they did that then I don't know what I'd do I don't think I can just make my mind up what I'd do right now I'm not even an adult yet
no does it feel like a long time ago then when you were a child yourself?
or does it feel like yesterday?
I am a child
yeah but like oh okay when you were like younger toddler and things does that feel like long long time ago?
yeah that feels a long time ago
can you remember much about it?
no
no? you don't remember going to the park and the graveyard?
no
no?
no
erm do you remember your room with a big leaf on top of your bed?
yeah I remember that
well that was before you were four
that's I re
is there any favourite memories that were your first memories?

mm yeah I remember going to Disneyland for the first time that was probably one of them eh that was probably one of my earliest favourite memories trying to think I don't know I can't think of anything earlier maybe if you reminded me of something earlier?
erm do you remember going to nursery school?
yeah I remember someone pushing me off the slide and then I had to go to hospital
yeah
but that's all I remember
yeah that wasn't very
and then I remember going into like the sleep room and it'd be all dark and then you'd go to sleep
do you remember playing in the garden there?
no
do you remember sitting round and having your beaker of juice? and your sandwiches for lunch?
no
and do you remember you had some mates there? do you remember you had a birthday party and we went to a playground and and you had a pirate pirate ship?
mm yeah I remember that I do I don't actually remember that I remember photos I remember photos
yeah
I don't remember it then
yeah that was quite fun so do you think do you think all society should be equal? everyone should be able to marry whoever they like?
yes well as long as both of the people want to marry
your top's inside out

we'll have to change it
not right now

swimming a lot I'm going to

with my best friend and there's also a lake rented out got a lake rented out that no one uses which my dad's girlfriend rented out and it's like a lake and there's diving boards into the lake and you can like that'll be really fun
yeah
I don't know what else we're doing there but I imagine it'll be fun
and you're still going to ?
yes I am I'm looking forward to that as well see see all the nice things
you're lucky you've got loads of holidays

so I'm looking forward to that

that is somewhere somewhere after the exams not sure of the date exactly

with ?

I'm pretty su I'm pretty sure that's what they're doing they're like before going to the cinema or after they're like going to like Starbucks or something which is in the in the place and just getting a drink and then going to the cinema come back and then there something

well I'm sure some of it could be unsupervised I'm just not happy about you wandering around beforehand and afterwards like unsupervised
so so are you okay with this? are you? are you okay with this?
mm hm

I I go into and then 's there and everything and everyone's there and we go to get like I don't know what let's just say let's just say we go to get something to eat and drink before the cinema we go we go somewhere erm all together we get something we eat it and then we go to the cinema then we watch the cinema then we go out the cinema then I wait to be collected
yeah but what I'd probably do is say hang around the shopping centre while you're having something to eat before you go into the cinema so that I'm around there
okay
I'm not necessarily sat down with you the whole time but just when you go in and then to the to the cinema afterwards and then pick you up after the cinema that's probably okay I imagine

well we'll see but yeah something like that yeah
will all of my friends know you're there?

but
if erm if that if

no?

you're having a sleepover anyway somebody else's
you're having a sleepover anyway
it's just

nothing
if it's like one of your mates saying can I have a birthday over here? sleepover over here? and he has his birthday over here it's just not really very polite
no I could
give something else you like to do

it doesn't ne it doesn't need to be my birthday over there it doesn't need to be all about anyone there it's just I just want to do something that I like and that would be going round my friend's house doesn't need to be for my birthday it's just that's what I would like to do and it doesn't ha I don't ha I don't have to celebrate my birthday there
you're you've been at well I'd have I've said I would let you have a sleepover so isn't that the same thing?
okay so I can?
you can have a sleepover at somebody's house

hm?
so not two sleepovers during the summer?
well why don't people come around here?
because 's asleep 's asleep and it's really really kind of bad to have a sleepover here
why is it bad?

because it's just can't be as loud cos 's asleep and like you have the TV you have the TV for most of the evening so then we couldn't use the TV and we'd all just be up in my room with not much space and they'd all have like sleeping bags and be all cramped up in my room so that'd be really but if I went to my friend's house we could like bring sleeping bags and sleep in their living room we could go on the Xbox we could be as loud as you want
I see but something else you might like to do do you think there might be something at erm like a laser thing or something? I think I don't know whether people might have to pay

haven't got much money no I mean it'd be like the cinema like you're you're paying for your own cinema aren't you? with ?

yeah that's because it's it's like you having your birthday with all like vintage things and me going oh yes oh yes vintage shoes something like that it doesn't work we and then all my friends would make fun of me
tell them I'd beat them up if they made fun of you

you won't beat anyone
you have so little faith in me

then there's then there's war would you like to go to war?
no I'm not stupid you get nothing out of war there are people in my class that think they should go to war but they're they're they're as dumb as bricks
dumb as bricks?
bricks aren't smart

one guy he left the school but he did get on my own nerves cos he was just so he always used to lie and he was just anything that all the cool people used to say he used to copy and try and be like them like lying like said he got detention even though he didn't and then punch me and try get in fights with me
well that's not very nice did you tell him his mum beat him?
stop
what's the matter?
it's like no

is it embarrassing? am I embarrassing you? where's the fun of being a parent if you can't embarrass your kid? spend so long bringing you up and giving you all this stuff and it's all quite hard work so you might as well get a bit of enjoyment out of it
you you got ups you got upset when I accidentally embarrassed you I didn't mean to
no that was different that was actually kind of putting me down I mean I'm teasing you by saying I'm going to beat your friends to stick up for you it's different

I'm not doing the same as you did
yeah I didn't even mean it I didn't even know what I was doing so you might not
